CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Type ,"ACT"),4,
IF( ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Work Transfers"), 24,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Annual Enrollment Phase 1") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Carrier")|| ISPICKVAL( Type ,"COBRA")|| ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Life Events")), 24,
IF( CONTAINS(TEXT(Type),"Supervisor"),8,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Discrepancies") && ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Reactivate Client")), 24,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Discrepancies") && NOT (ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Reactivate Client"))), 48,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Annual Enrollment Phase 2") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Annual Enrollment Phase 3") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Audit Adjustments") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Forms") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"H.S.A") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Rework") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Section 125") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Status/ Data Changes")), 48,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Analyst") || ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Letters")), 72,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type,"Enrollment") && ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Court Order")), 120,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Enrollment") && NOT (ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Court Order"))), 48,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Online") && (ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Access")||ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Enrollment Confirmation") || ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Navigation"))), 24,
IF( (ISPICKVAL( Type ,"Online") && (ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Enrollment Discrepancy")||ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"Other - Processing")|| ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,"System") )), 24, NULL
))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Response Time in Hours
